protocol.name: P-10016-2
protocol.text: Plants were germinated for 7 days (16 h light at 20Â°C, night at 6Â°C, 200 ¼E fluorescent light, 60â€"70% relative humidity), transferred to short-day condition (8 h light at 20Â°C, dark at 16Â°C, 180 ¼E fluorescent light, 60â€"70% relative humidity), picked after day 14 into pots and incubated under short day further 7 days. The Col-0 ecotype grew from day 22 on for 11 days in a 14-h photoperiod (20Â°C, 150 ¼E fluorescent light, 60â€"70% relative humidity)

protocol.name: P-10016-3
protocol.text: Plants were harvested in the vegetative state with 3 rosettes per sample, and typically at least 5 replicate samples. Rosettes were transferred into liquid nitrogen in darkness.

protocol.name: P-10016-4
protocol.text: Approximately 10 ¼g of total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets.
